summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and outside temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.3 mm), light levels (up 3023 lux), and cloud levels (up 440 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1374 m), light levels (up 5373 lux), feels like temperature (up 2.6°C), and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 440.4m lower than yesterday, 975.5m lower than past week, 1374.4m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1432.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2410m and 2810m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable. Possible light showers, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
